sample.description: Wild-type SUM-159 cell, treated with 0.5 mM oleic acid for 45 mins prior to high pressure freezing to induce the formation of lipid droplets.
sample.protocol: High pressure freezing, freeze-substitution resin embedding with 2% OsO<sub>4</sub> 0.1% UA 3% H<sub>2</sub>O in Acetone, resin embedding in Eponate 12.
sample.contributions: Sample provided by Jeeyun Chung, Tobias Walther and Bob Farese (Harvard U.), prepared for imaging by Gleb Shtengel (HHMI/Janelia), with imaging and post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia).
